scripts.build: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting build process...' && npm run clean && echo 'âœ… Clean completed' && npm run build:sre-next && echo 'âœ… SRE NEXT completed' && npm run build:index && echo 'âœ… Index completed'
scripts.clean: echo 'ðŸ§¹ Cleaning dist directory...' && rm -rf dist && echo 'âœ… Dist directory removed'
scripts.build:sre-next: echo 'ðŸ“Š Building SRE NEXT presentation...' && npx slidev build SRE-NEXT-2025/slides.md --out dist/sre-next-2025 --base /sre-next-2025/ && echo 'âœ… SRE NEXT build completed'
scripts.build:slidev-system: echo 'âš™ï¸ Building Slidev System presentation...' && npx slidev build SLIDEV-SYSTEM/slides.md --out dist/slidev-system --base /slidev-system/ && echo 'âœ… Slidev System build completed'
scripts.build:index: echo 'ðŸ  Building index page...' && node scripts/build-index.js && echo 'âœ… Index page completed'
scripts.build:full: npm run clean && npm run build:sre-next && npm run build:slidev-system && npm run build:index
scripts.export: npm run export:sre-next-pdf && npm run export:system-pdf
scripts.format: slidev format SRE-NEXT-2025/slides.md && slidev format SLIDEV-SYSTEM/slides.md
